title: Integrated Modular Learning for Information Literacy in Engineering at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and general information retrieval skills
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens aiming to apply engineering approaches to everyday and community problem-solving, requiring information evaluation and utilization skills

learning_goals: Identify and critically evaluate reliable information sources for engineering problem-solving
Integrate engineering concepts and information literacy through modular learning materials
Systematically perform information retrieval, analysis, and synthesis processes in real-world social problem contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
